Reviews.Title: Senior Mobile Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: The price is great and young people can use it easily. But for a senior the operating system is complicated and hard to understand. The visual part and dialing is great. The phone would be better if it was longer for a better hold, when it comes to having arthritis. The volume is great and extra features like the emergency SOS button and flash light is an A+.  Hope this help improve the phone. Thank You.

Reviews.Title: Attractive Senior Phone with No Instructions
Reviews.Author: telenova
Reviews.Content: This phone appears to be a stripped-down version of the Just 5 J509 senior mobile phone, lacking some of the latter's features at a saving of $20 on the sticker price. It ships without instructions, making the operation of the phone an interesting puzzle to decipher. If you would prefer not to solve the puzzle by yourself, the Just 5 J509 manual contains all of the information you need. You can find it on the Just 5 website.

Reviews.Title: THE PHONE DID NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: José restrepo
Reviews.Content: tHE PHONE DID NOT WORK, IT SEEMS IT IS NOT UNLOCKED YET. WITHOUT SIM CARD THE DISPLAY SHOWS SIGNAL FULL RECEPTION, BUT WE BEGIN TO START A CALL, IT SAYS NOT AVAILABLE.

Reviews.Title: Worst shop I have ever done
Reviews.Author: Jorge F Calderon Morales
Reviews.Content: It supposed to be unlocked and it is not.  Can't make any phone call and I try different providers.  Not recommended

Reviews.Title: Issue with this mobile phone
Reviews.Author: Liliam Molina
Reviews.Content: AttributesThis product not function very well.Shutdown without previous notice and another time when I move in all option cannot configure; because it shutdown single

Reviews.Title: Extremely Difficult to Program No Louder Than Others
Reviews.Author: Teresa Oborny
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mother who has a hard time hearing on regular cell phones.  This phone boast that it's loud and easy for Seniors to use.  I found this phone extremely difficult to program and I didn't hear any increase in the volume compared to the phone she was using.  I would suggest if you're looking for a phone for a senior this one is not it.  I'll be returning this phone and thank goodness for the 60 day return policy.

Reviews.Title: Old Man Phone--Good, but...
Reviews.Author: Drummin' Joe
Reviews.Content: Phone is very basic.  This is the first model and it came with no directions.  The features are very simplistic, like DOS or Win 3.1.  It was a decent phone but the audio quality for my 87yo dad was too "AM" radio over "FM" quality.  The tones were too thin.  The loudspeaker was good.  Keep in mind my dad doesn't really know what he wants.  He gave up his last phone because he said he couldn't open it.  I put a piece of tape on the end to pull and now the phone was good.  He's old.

Reviews.Title: Things are great
Reviews.Author: joe keeble
Reviews.Content: The product is fine. a member of the family found a manufacturer rep and was told the phone would not work with pay as you go sim cards. They said it would work fine with sim cards from a contract company. They gave no reason why the Seller was not informed of this. It was not the Sellers fault. The Seller responded excellently and the family is happy. The 92 year old says it does not make sense to put her on a contract phone and is going into assisted living.

Reviews.Title: A cheap senior phone with no box, no manual, and no FCC approval for USA use.
Reviews.Author: Philip M Sieg II

} var node = cv_mo26JHGSTYJ9F4Wpreplay.parentNode; var cv_mo26JHGSTYJ9F4WcurrentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo26JHGSTYJ9F4WcurrentClick) { return cv_mo26JHGSTYJ9F4WcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 2:54 MinsI bought this senior phone to compare to others available on the market and through Amazon. I was distressed that there was no box, no manual, no customer service number, no easy way for a senior to receive help or guidance. Upon closer inspection there also is no Branding on the phone, and no FCC ID inside the battery compartment. This makes the phone illegal to sell in the USA because it has no regulatory approval, and no testing to insure both quality, and safety from cellular radiation. My next step will be to alert Amazon and ask that the listing be removed.

ProductInfo.Features:
Safe Talk Easy-to-Use Senior Phone and FREE Accessories
Only phone with the Silver Alert Emergency Button
Large Keypad with Speaking Numbers and All Accessories Included at No Extra Charge
Alerts First Responders and up to 4 Friends of Your Choice in Emergency
60 Day Money-Back Guarantee and 1 Year Replacement Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Safe Talk Senior Mobile Phone, Big Buttons, Unlocked GSM, Silver Alert Emergency SOS Button
